list.description:
As my second sight i decided to create our lord and savior the legendary Audi RS2 as a sight in War Thunder

10 sights with 3 sizes
-whole screen big
-1/4 size has 5 different places on the screen
-1/16 size has 4 different places on the screen

#audi #audiRS2 #car

Made my first ever sight so it is not perfect as to excpect but it works well enough

2 pictures to show how it looks in game both without zooma nd with zoom (note that the tank i was using is the german rank 7 premium "Leopard 2 (PzBtl 123) wich has 12X zoom at most so the zoom can be more in or out depending on the tank)

The sight is the Hand symbol that Alucard does in Hellsing Ultimate

Also i forgot the change the zip files name so its just the name the pc gives it in Finnish

#hellsing #hellsing_ultimate #alucard #anime

Прицельная сетка с шедевро L3\33 CC на скрине приближение 3х

Рофельная работа от моего друга

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

#alltanks #L3 #warthunder #braindamage #wtdraw

Nishi from Girls und Panzer. You lovely people get a 3-sight package this time!

戦車、前進！Sensha, zenshin!

3 versions - "closed_no_shading", "open_no_shading", and "open_with_shade", respectively. I did kinda have to extrapolate for the hair on the latter two files, so excuse me if they aren't a perfect representation of Kinuyo's hairstyles :)

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions! OR just drop a comment on one of my posts.

#kinuyo_nishi #chihatan #japan #gup #girls_und_panzer #tank #anime
